LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedMayo.label: maionese consumida (de refeição)
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedMayo.description: Maionese é uma emulsão espessa de ovo, óleo e outras ervas. A maionese, embora terrível para você, tem um sabor agradável e é muito calórica. Ele reduz a taxa de fome em 15% por 24 horas.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedAgave.label: néctar de agave consumido (de refeição)
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedAgave.description: O néctar de agave é um néctar fino e semidoce, conhecido por suas propriedades cicatrizantes e antiinflamatórias. Dá um aumento de velocidade de ganho de imunidade de 15% por 24 horas.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSpices.label: especiarias consumidas (da refeição)
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSpices.description: Consumiu uma variedade de especiarias aromáticas e picantes. Aumenta o stat de manipulação por 24 horas.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFed.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFed.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 25% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedSimple.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedSimple.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 25% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedFine.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedFine.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 25% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedLavish.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedLavish.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 25% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedGourmet.label: well fed (from grilled meal)
LanguageData.VCE_WellFedGourmet.description: I have eaten a delicious and filling grilled meat. It lowers hunger rate by 25% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedDigestibleResurrectorNanites: Resurrector nanites will resurrect this person as long as they are active. The effect lasts for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_SugarRush.label: consumed sugar (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_SugarRush.description: Sugar is easily converted into energy by the body, which may result in a nice burst of energy. It increases moving stat by 15% for 24 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetMeal.label: consumed gourmet food (from meal)
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetMeal.description: This colonist consumed an incredible food.
